title: Implement zenith.ai module (stream_llm, @tool, ToolRouter)
description:
Phase 1 AI module for v0.1.0 release.

## Components

1. **stream_llm()** - SSE wrapper for LLM token streaming
   - Support OpenAI and Anthropic response formats
   - Backpressure handling
   - Clean SSE formatting

2. **@tool decorator** - Auto-generate OpenAI function schemas
   - Extract from Pydantic models and type hints
   - Generate JSON Schema for parameters
   - Support docstring extraction for descriptions

3. **ToolRouter** - HTTP endpoints with schema generation
   - Register @tool routes
   - Export schemas via app.get_tool_schemas()
   - OpenAI-compatible format

## Dependencies

- openai, anthropic, httpx-sse (optional via zenith[ai])

## References

- ai/research/2025-12-ai-strategy.md
- ai/DESIGN.md (AI Module Architecture section)

title: Add OAuth2/OIDC support
description:
Phase 2 OAuth2/OIDC support for v0.2.0 release.

## Features

1. **OAuth2 Provider Support**
   - Google
   - GitHub
   - Generic OIDC

2. **Auth Flows**
   - Authorization Code Flow
   - PKCE support
   - Token refresh

3. **Integration**
   - Works with existing Auth dependency
   - Session-based token storage
   - User creation/linking callbacks

## References

- Consider authlib or similar library
- OWASP OAuth2 best practices
